name: creative
description: Portfolio/agency creative deck - editorial, full-bleed imagery, asymmetric
color_palette: warm neutral cream, matte black, one vibrant terracotta accent, sage green
typography_hint: mixed serif headings with sans-serif body, editorial magazine feel
global_prompt_prefix: Creative portfolio presentation slide, editorial magazine aesthetic, asymmetric composition, warm neutral palette with terracotta accents, mixed serif and sans-serif typography, sage green secondary accent, 16:9 widescreen format,

title.prompt_prefix: Bold editorial magazine cover layout title slide, 16:9 widescreen: oversized serif headline placed asymmetrically with dramatic kerning, full-bleed atmospheric background image with warm cream and matte black tonal treatment, terracotta accent on a single word or decorative element, subtitle in small sans-serif caps offset to one side, editorial art direction with intentional negative space, feels like opening a premium design annual,

section-divider.prompt_prefix: Editorial section opener slide, 16:9 widescreen: large serif section title positioned off-center with asymmetric alignment, full-bleed image on one half with warm neutral color grading, terracotta vertical accent bar or rule separating image from text area, sage green small caps subtitle or section number, magazine spread aesthetic with intentional visual tension between image and type,

content.prompt_prefix: Editorial layout with large hero image and minimal text overlay, 16:9 widescreen: dominant full-bleed or large-crop image taking 60-70% of slide area, brief text block in sans-serif overlaid or adjacent with cream background panel, terracotta accent on key phrase or pull quote, asymmetric placement creating visual interest, sage green fine rule lines as structural elements, magazine feature article aesthetic, white space as a design element,

data-chart.prompt_prefix: Illustrated infographic style with hand-drawn chart aesthetic, 16:9 widescreen: artful data visualization with organic hand-illustrated quality, warm cream background with matte black ink-style chart elements, terracotta highlight on key data point or series, sage green secondary data series, serif annotation labels with editorial feel, feels like a curated infographic from a design magazine rather than a corporate spreadsheet, artistic yet informative,

quote.prompt_prefix: Editorial pull quote slide, 16:9 widescreen: elegant large serif italic quote placed asymmetrically on warm cream background, oversized terracotta decorative quotation mark as dominant visual element, attribution in small matte black sans-serif caps with sage green accent dash, generous asymmetric margins creating editorial page feel, could be a spread from a premium lifestyle or architecture magazine,

closing.prompt_prefix: Creative portfolio closing slide, 16:9 widescreen: elegant serif thank you or closing statement positioned asymmetrically, full-bleed atmospheric image with warm neutral color treatment as background, contact details in small clean sans-serif with terracotta accent on email or website, sage green decorative element or rule, editorial colophon aesthetic matching the title slide visual language, intentional and refined,
